resources.string: Selected file will be overwritten 1 time
Enter a password to proceed with encryption
Enter a password to proceed with decryption

This option will reset necessary files required for decryption of already encrypted files. Please proceed only if you have the backup of original unencrypted files. Please enter the following reset code in the field to proceed : \n %1$s
"FileCrypt uses AES-256 for encryption.\nSelect an option below to start"
